typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		stationId as string,
		name as string,
		shortName as string,
		stationsTag as string,
		location as (latitude as double, longitude as double),
		timebase as string,
		active as boolean,
		owner as string,
		regionId as string,
		monitors as (channelId as string, name as string, alias as string, active as boolean, typeId as string, pollutantId as string, units as string, description as string)[],
		StationTarget as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> statinfo
source(output(
		stationId as string,
		data as (datetime as string, channels as (id as string, name as string, alias as string, value as double, status as string, valid as boolean, description as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> statid
statinfo foldDown(unroll(monitors, monitors),
	mapColumn(
		stationId,
		name,
		shortName,
		stationsTag,
		latitude = location.latitude,
		longitude = location.longitude,
		timebase,
		active,
		owner,
		regionId,
		channelId = monitors.channelId,
		monitorname = monitors.name,
		monitoralias = monitors.alias,
		monitoractive = monitors.active,
		monitortypeId = monitors.typeId,
		monitorpollutantId = monitors.pollutantId,
		monitorunitsunits = monitors.units,
		monitordescription = monitors.description,
		StationTarget
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> stationinfo
statid foldDown(unroll(data),
	mapColumn(
		stationId,
		datetime = data.datetime,
		channels = data.channels,
		id = data.channels.id,
		name = data.channels.name,
		alias = data.channels.alias,
		value = data.channels.value,
		status = data.channels.status,
		valid = data.channels.valid,
		description = data.channels.description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> stationid
stationinfo, stationid join(stationinfo@stationId == stationid@stationId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sql
